project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the Agro-Processing Development Project is to support the development of the agro-processing sector in Albania and to help improve the conditions for financing its restructuring through the financial sector in order to improve marketing of farms outputs (thereby improving rural incomes) and availability of food products to urban population. The project has two main components: 1) an entrepreneurs support component which includes technical assistance, equipment and vehicles, and training and study tours; and 2) an investment credit component.
